title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.11 - Guardianshiprules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.11 - Guardianshiprules

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the requirementscontained in the maintenance petition, any
application from a parent requestingwithdrawal from a guardianship account must
include a copy of the Federaland State income tax returns of the applicant for
the last three years. (b) In order to ensure the
properopening of all initial guardianship accounts, where the court directs
thatthe deposit be made jointly with the clerk of the Surrogate's Court, a
representativeof the Surrogate's Court shall be present at the bank when the
account isopened. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1851.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
